icon-scale.description: Sets the scaling factor for taskbar icons.

max-width.label: Maximum width

only-same-monitor.description: Show only apps from the monitor where the bar is located.

show-pinned-apps.description: Show pinned apps from the dock in the taskbar.

show-title.description: Display window titles in the taskbar.

smart-width.description: Automatically adjust entry width based on the number of entries.

title-width.description: Set the width of window titles in the taskbar (in pixels).

colorize-icons.description: Apply theme colors to tray icons.

When enabled, unpinned tray items are shown in a drawer panel.
When disabled, all tray items are shown inline.

display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.
display-mode.label: Display mode

character-count.description: Number of characters to display from workspace names (1-10).
character-count.label: Character count

enable-scrollwheel.description: Switch between workspaces using the mouse scroll wheel.
enable-scrollwheel.label: Scroll to switch workspaces

follow-focused-screen.description: Display workspaces from the currently focused screen, rather than the screen where the bar is located.

label-mode.description: Choose how workspace labels are displayed.

show-applications.description: Display application icons inside each workspace.

show-labels-only-when-occupied.description: Only show workspace labels when they contain windows.
show-labels-only-when-occupied.label: Show labels only when occupied

section.description: A sleek and minimal desktop shell thoughtfully crafted for Wayland, built with Quickshell.

transparent.label: Transparent background

section.description: Show bar on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

section.description: Drag widgets to change their order. Use the right-click menu to transfer widgets between sections or remove them.

description.scheme-content: Derives colors that closely match the underlying image.
description.scheme-fidelity: High-fidelity palette that preserves source hues.
description.scheme-fruit-salad: Colorful mix of bright contrasting accents.
description.scheme-monochrome: Minimal palette built around a single hue.
description.scheme-neutral: Muted palette with subdued and calming tones.
description.scheme-rainbow: Diverse palette spanning the full spectrum.

section.description: Main settings for Noctalia's colors.

mode.description: Enables automatic switching between Light and Dark Mode.

switch.description: Switches to a darker theme for easier viewing at night.

generate-templates.description: Generate Matugen templates (GTK, terminal themes, etc.) when using predefined color schemes.

user-templates.description: Only enable if you know what you are doing — refer to our online documentation

Left-click & drag: Move or resize the widget.

enforce-minimum.label: Enforce minimum brightness (1%)

auto-schedule.description: Based on the sunset and sunrise time in {location} — recommended.

enable.description: Apply a warm color filter to reduce blue light emission.

force-activation.description: Ignores the schedule and applies the night filter immediately.

manual-schedule.description: Set custom times for sunrise and sunset.

section.description: Reduce blue light emission to help you sleep better and reduce eye strain.

command-info.description:
• Commands are executed via shell (sh -c)
• Commands run in background (detached)
• Test buttons execute with current values

parameters.description:
• Wallpaper hook: $1 = wallpaper path, $2 = screen name
• Theme toggle hook: $1 = true/false (Dark Mode state)
• Screen lock/unlock hooks: No parameters
• Performance mode hooks: No parameters

performance-mode-disabled.description: Command to be executed when Noctalia Performance Mode is disabled.

performance-mode-enabled.label: Performance mode enabled

screen-unlock.description: Command to be executed when the lock screen is unlocked.

enable.description: Enable or disable all hook commands.
enable.label: Enable hooks

theme-changed.label: Theme changed

clip-preview.description: Show a preview of the clipboard content when using the >clip command.
clip-preview.label: Enable clip preview

clipboard-history.description: Access previously copied items from the launcher.
clipboard-history.label: Enable clipboard history

custom-launch-prefix.description: Prefix commands with a custom launcher (e.g., 'runapp' for systemd integration).

custom-launch-prefix-enabled.label: Enable custom launch prefix

show-categories.description: Show category tabs for filtering applications.

sort-by-usage.description: When enabled, frequently launched apps appear first in the list.
sort-by-usage.label: Sort by most used

12hour-format.description: Display time in 12-hour format on the lock screen and calendar. The bar clock has its own settings.

use-analog.label: Use analog style clock

week-numbers.label: Show week numbers

section.description: Get accurate weather and Night Light scheduling by setting your location.

enabled.description: Show weather information throughout the interface and fetch weather data. When disabled, all weather elements will be hidden and no network requests will be made.

fahrenheit.description: Display temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius.

show-effects.description: Show additional visual effects (like rain, snow, or lightning) on the weather card.

show-in-calendar.description: Show the daily weather forecast directly in your calendar view.
show-in-calendar.label: Display weather in calendar

show-hibernate.description: Show the option 'hibernate' in the energy actions.

show-session-buttons.description: Allow access to power settings from the lock screen.

section.description: Manage Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connections.

low-urgency.description: How long low priority notifications stay visible.

do-not-disturb.description: Disable all notification popups when enabled.

section.description: Configure the session menu panel behavior and appearance.
